SELECT category, title, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as createdAt FROM notice ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT c.title as title, u.name as name FROM certificate cert JOIN enrollment e ON cert.enrollment_id = e.enrollment_id JOIN course c ON e.course_id = c.course_id JOIN users u ON e.user_id = u.user_id WHERE cert.is_approved = 'N' ORDER BY cert.issued_at DESC LIMIT 4
